department.ch: 應用地質研究所碩士班

remark.ch: 與AG7108活動構造專題討論II合班上課

goal.en: To expand knowledge on active faults topics, to acquire the ability to critically read and understand a scientific article and to develop presentation skills.
goal.ch: To expand knowledge on active faults topics, to acquire the ability to critically read and understand a scientific article and to develop presentation skills.

content.en: Study and present scientific articles in the field of active fault studies (earthquake geology, paleo- seismology, present-day crustal deformation, tectonic geomorphology, structural geology, regional tectonics, earthquake hazard, fault-displacement hazard…)
content.ch: Study and present scientific articles in the field of active fault studies (earthquake geology, paleo- seismology, present-day crustal deformation, tectonic geomorphology, structural geology, regional tectonics, earthquake hazard, fault-displacement hazard…)

grading.en: Article report and understanding (40％), slides design and presentation skills (30％), discussion (20％), overall participation in the class (10％)
grading.ch: Article report and understanding (40％), slides design and presentation skills (30％), discussion (20％), overall participation in the class (10％)

en.Assessments: Presentation/Oral Exam ， Research Report(printed on paper)
